description: Four ingredients is all you need for these cheesy corn-stuffed mini capsicums. Try this healthier recipe for an easy afternoon snack for the kids.
name: Cheesy Corn-Stuffed Mini Capsicums Recipe | Woolworths
recipeCategory: Snacks,Kids light meal & snack,Fresh Food Kids,Kids lunch
recipeIngredient: 350g capsicum mini vine sweet, halved lengthways, deseeded

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 240째C/220째C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper.
Combine ricotta, white sections of onion and corn in a medium bowl. Season with pepper.

HowToTip.tipText: To freeze uncooked stuffed capsicums, place on a baking paper-lined tray and freeze for 2 hours, then transfer to an airtight container. Cook as required in an oven preheated to 240째C/220째C fan-forced for 18 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill capsicum halves with ricotta mixture and place on tray (see Tips). Bake for 12 minutes or until filling is heated through and capsicums are tender.
Serve sprinkled with green sections of onion.
